Introduction Installation

Introduction

The Modular Full-Stack Youâ€™ll Love.

Welcome to Heart.js! It's a modular TypeScript starter that brings together Hono, Expo, AI SDK, React, and TanStack Router without tightly coupling your frontend and backend into a single runtime.

Full-stack frameworks like SvelteKit and Next.js are excellent for building connected apps. However, adding a mobile app or an external API can become complicated because the frontend and backend are often too intertwined.

Heart.js is the answer to this problem. It establishes a clean separation where each layer can share code, types, and structure without obstructing the others.

What's Inside?

Heart.js provides a curated collection of leading web development technologies, ready to be composed into your ideal stack.

Hono

An edge-ready, ultrafast web framework for your APIs and microservices.

React + TanStack Router

A powerful combination for building type-safe, modern web frontends with Vite and shadcn/ui.

Expo

Create cross-platform mobile applications with react-native-reusables for consistent UI.

AI SDK

Optionally integrate AI features with Vercelâ€™s AI SDK for streaming and multi-provider support.

Docker Ready

Easily spin up databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, or Redis with Docker Compose.

Key Principles

Heart.js is built on a few core ideas:

PrincipleDescription
ModularEach part of your stack (API, web, mobile) is independent, making it easy to manage, scale, or replace.
Type-SafeWith TypeScript at its core, you can share types between your backend and frontend, ensuring end-to-end type safety.
No Lock-inThe setup uses the official CLIs for each technology (hono init, etc.), so you're not tied to a proprietary system. Itâ€™s just tools that play well together.
Developer-FirstAn interactive CLI, modern tooling, and optional integrations are designed to make the development experience fun and productive.

Installation

Create a new Heart.js project with your favorite stack in seconds.
